title: Oral administration of proniosomal glibenclamide formulation protects testicular tissue from hyperglycemia fluctuations and ROS via Nrf2/HO-1 pathway
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Nouf M. Alyami, Zainab A. Alnakhli, Noura M. Alshiban, Saleh Maodaa, Ghufran A. Almuhaini, Rafa Almeer, Doaa Alshora, Mohamed Ibrahim
